name: querysurge-scenario-results-task
description: Get detailed results for a scenario and attach them as an artifact. Add the Publish Test Results task after this task to show scenario results in the build summary.
author: RTTS

inputs.name: host
inputs.label: QuerySurge hostname
inputs.helpMarkDown: Hostname/FQDN/IP address of QuerySurge server (ex. qs.mycorp.com)

inputs.name: useHttps
inputs.label: Use HTTPS
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether to connect to the QuerySurge server via HTTPS (TLS/SSL). May require deployment of organizational CA certificates.

inputs.name: projectId
inputs.label: Project ID #
inputs.helpMarkDown: ID # of Project (found in Global Adminstration -> Projects)

inputs.name: execId
inputs.label: Scenario Execution ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Execution ID of scenario. Execution ID should be set to the output variable provided by the Run Test Suite Task. For example, if the Run Suite Task's name is `executeRevenueTests`, the value which should be entered into Scenario Execution ID is `$(executeRevenueTests.execId)`.
